participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, enjoys physical activities like dancing and participating in dog agility classes. Values knowledge and has a scientific background.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Passionate about cooking and enjoys water activities. A laid-back individual who appreciates comic books and has a fun-loving spirit.
participant_2.background: spiderman is my favorite. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. l also love comic books. if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water.
